about_the_game:
Futa on Male
Kinetic Visual Novel

Your arrogance really has got you into a bit of a pickle 🍆 this time. Long story short, you have been challenged to a wrestling match by a professional wrestler, and she's stacked pretty good.

In one corner--you--a scrawny ass mofo with quivering legs; in the other, nothing short of a Greek goddess.

Ding, ding, ding... 🔔

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.


Gameplay

  • Kinetic Visual Novel
  • H-Scenes
  • ~6K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Futanari on Male sex
- Domination
- Non-consensual / Forceful Penetration
- Dirty language
